meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of microvilli.
meanings.sent1: The microvillar structures help in absorbing nutrients efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The small intestine is lined with microvillar projections for nutrient absorption.
meanings.sent3: The tiny microvillar hairs on the cell surface make it look like a miniature forest.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as sharp and precise as a microvillar edge.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate microvillar patterns on the cell surface.

meanings.sent1: The microvillar surface of the cells increases their surface area for absorption.
meanings.sent2: The microvillar layer provides a textured surface for better absorption.
meanings.sent3: The microvillar coating on the cells resembled a fuzzy blanket under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The microvillar texture of the membrane felt like a field of tiny grass under the fingers.
meanings.sent5: The microvillar appearance of the cells made them stand out under the microscope.
